item.title: Where in the World Happen Most Murders
item.description: A series of maps of the world showing where in the world the least and the most murders happen for the years 1995 to 2011.

item.title: Geo Maps Drawn from IP Locations
item.description: Geographic maps of the world and most continents drawn based on an IP location dataset with 419433 records.

item.title: A Map of Bike Routes in Berlin, Germany
item.description: The bike routes map for Berlin, Germany shows 14 different biking routes through and around the city. Created with OpenLayers, Open Street Map and data from Senatsverwaltung für Stadtentwicklung und Umwelt.

item.title: Real-Time World Map of Earthquakes
item.description: A geographic map of the world showing real-time data for recent earthquakes rendered with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: World Aid Flow, Transparency, Development
item.description: An interactive visualization looking at world aid flow, aid transparency, and development in receiving countries created with the D3 JavaScript library.
